name: Staked PIKU
description: The Piku ecosystem encompasses essential components required to cultivate the ideal yield-optimized stablecoin, ranging from transparent yield backings to a DAO led decision-making process. Below is an introductory overview of Piku's products. Piku ecosystem is structured around three pivotal tokens: USP, the yield-optimized stablecoin designed to offer stability and resilience against market volatility; PIKU, the utility token empowering PikuDAO to steer the project's direction through democratic voting; and sPIKU, a representation of voting power in the DAO's governance, obtained through staking PIKU tokens.
